name: Firefox: Minimal Elegance Theme, transparency
description:
My new theme called Minimal Elegance for new Firefox. It's a transparent theme for firefox with minimalistic style. You can see it on screenshot.

!!!!IMPORTANT!!!
For effect us is in screenshot you need Stratiform addon.
Stratiform - https://addons.mozilla.org/cs/firefox/addon/stratiform/
!!!!IMPORTANT!!!


and if you want bookmarks buttons on right of screenshot download:
Google shortcuts - https://addons.mozilla.org/cs/firefox/addon/google-shortcuts-all-google-se/

Enjoy this theme ;)
